welcome.title: Hi, I'm Cline
welcome.description: I can do all kinds of tasks thanks to breakthroughs in Claude 4 Sonnet's agentic coding capabilities and access to tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use a browser, and execute terminal commands (with your permission, of course). I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.
welcome.subDescription: Sign up for an account to get started for free, or use an API key that provides access to models like Claude Sonnet.

chat.whatCanIDo: What can I do for you?
chat.infoTooltip: I can develop software step-by-step by editing files, exploring projects, running commands, and using browsers. I can even extend my capabilities with MCP tools to assist beyond basic code completion.
chat.inputHint: Type @ for context, / for slash commands & workflows, hold shift to drag in files/images
chat.errorUnsupportedFile: Files other than images are currently disabled
chat.modeActionPlan: gather information to architect a plan
